Nightshift remains in vehicle form so the chamber can repair the rest of th=
e damages that were done to his vehicle form.  He restfully dims his headli=
ghts as he slips into a restful frame of mind.

" The first lesson of the d=
ay is real simple.  Find your inner peace.  Be at one with yourself and onl=
y then can ya achieve true balance physically and mentally."

Perpetually o=
n the move and constantly busy. 

On Jul 31, 2011, at 11:39 PM, Airshadow N=
ightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:

>

led and waited for the process to start.

ghts reply.

> " I promise, the training takes a while but once ya go th=
rough it, it'll stick with ya for ages.  You'll be able ta defend yourself =
no matter if ya got energy weapons or not.  Your body,mind and spark become=
 your most powerful defense.  You'll see when I do a few demo rounds with y=
ou guys."
>  
> He chuckles quietly.
>  
> " let's hope Rodimus joins in an=
d pays attention this time."
> 
> Perpetually on the move and constantly bu=
sy.

it. =E2=80=9Dthen she added =E2=80=9CLet=E2=80=99s do this...=E2=80=9D

>>=
 Nightshift listens thoughtfully.  Being a Pretender himself, he too was ve=
xed between factions as he would often have to fight against his own factio=
n when in the company of Decepticon forces.  He could feel her pain    and =
flashes his parking lights in response. 
>>  
>> " I sure know where you're=
 comm'n from.  Way back when, when the cons didn't know my true faction, I'=
d have ta take out my bot buddies when I was supposedly in the company of D=
ecepticon forces, just so that I didn't get suspected of treason.  Slag was=
 that a nail in my tires.  I hated every minute of  those battles.  And wha=
t was worse, the times when the cons won their battles because of someth'n =
I did.  That hurt more than anything else.  Still does, because sooner or l=
ater I'm gonna have ta do it all over again.  I really don't wanna do that =
but, if we're gonna get the edge on the cons, it may be up ta me ta put on =
the pretender routine again.  But this time I'm gonna have ta make it look =
real.  And it might involve me tak'n out one of our own in order ta get bac=
k the trust of the cons.  I really don't wanna go that route and I hope non=
e of the bosses asks me ta do that.  I dunno if Tucson would ask but I got =
a funny feel'n that Leo or Rodimus might.  I hope it doesn't turn out that =
way but I cant do anything about that."
>> 
>> He sighs.
>> 
>> " If there =
was a way ta get rid of my Decepticon badge, I'd have it removed in a spark=
 beat."  
>> 
>> Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.
>>

 28, 2011, at 1:35 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:

r bitter experience as BlackStorm and with

riginal-----

teaching the art of the Ninjabot to Nightlight, which would enhance her 
>>=

>>=
> discipline, grace, and of course effectiveness.
>>>

ential in her and turns his head in both Nightlight and 
>>> Bumps directio=
n.
>>> 
>>> " Bump's right, that's somethn' ya gotta learn, but I see a lot=
ta potential 
>>> for train'n ya as a Ninjabot. You got the right moves, mo=
dy, and grace, and 
>>> once you're trained, there's gonna be no stopp'n yo=
u Nightlight. Master 
>>> Yokitron once said, that a student often shows po=
tential even if they don't      
>>> realize it themselves. Now, that's tot=
ally up to you if ya want the 
>>> training, just see me after we get repai=
red, and I'll set up a training 
>>> program for ya. Hmm, maybe Rodimus mig=
ht wanna join in on it too.. It's a 
>>> perfect opportunity for both of yo=
u ta get some extra training under your 
>>> belts."
>>> 
>>> He positions =
himself again.
>>> 
>>> " It would really help both of you out a lot, see'n=
 what Hydras managed ta 
>>> pull on ya in the past. The reason why it didn=
't work on Tucson or me, is 
>>> that Master Yokitron's training sorta prep=
ared us spiritually for what could 
>>> come down the pike. Clear minds emp=
ty of thoughts are less likely ta get 
>>> infected by negative influences,=
 simply because there's no thought energy ta 
>>> hold onto. Clear mind, cl=
ear soul, clear spark. Bad stuff just goes in one 
>>> way, and out the oth=
er. You guys had a lot on your minds when Hydras took 
>>> you. And that co=
uldn't be helped, but now it can be. I bet my spark plugs 
>>> that if you =
and Rodimus train with me, I can get both of ya up ta our level 
>>> and th=
at'll make you a pair of the strongest Autobots this side of the 
>>> galax=
y, but not the type of strength most warriors perceive. This type of 
>>> s=
trength is the strength of spirit, inner peace, and harmony. A perfect 
>>>=
 balance between spark, soul, and mind. And yeah, there's a lotta dexterity=
 
>>> aquired in Ninjabot training, the type of dexterity that makes even T=
ucson 
>>> Prime a bit different then the traditional Autobot Commander. It=
's a 
>>> difference Hydras has no inclination how ta fend off. THAT'S the =
direction 
>>> Tucson is gonna take, and if you guys were trained in our ar=
t, so more power 
>>> to ya."
>>> 
>>> He then looks to Bump, as the repair=
 bench does its job to repair the 
>>> internal damages done to him.
>>> 
>=
>> " Speakn' of performance, that reminds me... I need new hydraulic shock =

>>> absorbers, timing belt, and I know my struts need work, new tires, bod=
y 
>>> work, and Ty Rods fixed. Oh yeah, need a new front and back end alig=
nment 
>>> too."
>>> 
>>> To repair the damgages to his alt form, he now tr=
ansforms into his vehicle 
>>> mode, to prepare for the rest of his repairs=
. He also notices a busted 
>>> headlight on the left side.
>>> 
>>> "Scrap=
, throw in a new headlight for the left side, new bumpers, front, 
>>> back=
, side, and awww slag, transmission's actn' up. Probably because I 
>>> sma=
cked that tree real hard in alt form. After this is all done, I am so 
>>> =
gonna give those preds the bill, literally. In other words, I need a total =

>>> overhaul ta my alt form. And if you can help it, I'd like ta hold onta=
 this 
>>> one for a while."

bsp; Your body,mind and spark become your most 
powerful defense.  You=
